column1: Ribeirão Pires is a city in the Metropolitan Region of São Paulo (state)
column2: Brazil. It is part of the "ABC Region." The population is 120
column3: 396 (2015 est.) in an area of 99.1 km². The elevation is 763 m.

column1: Its neighboring cities are Ferraz de Vasconcelos to the north
column2: Suzano to the northeast and east
column3: Rio Grande da Serra to the southeast and south
column4: Santo Andre southwest and Mauá northwest. The city is served by trains from line 10 of CPTM. It became its own municipality in 1953
column5: following its emancipation from Santo André.
